mapper.select: SELECT id, activity_id AS activityId, sku_id AS skuId, stock_total AS stockTotal, stock_month AS stockMonth, stock_day AS stockDay, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM activity_sku WHERE activity_id = #{activityId}
mapper.update: UPDATE activity_sku SET stock_total = stock_total - 1, stock_month = stock_month - 1, stock_day = stock_day - 1 WHERE activity_id = #{activityId} AND sku_id = #{skuId} AND stock_total > 0 AND stock_month > 0 AND stock_day > 0
